rooms.description: Central open space with Mediterranean-style landscaping, includes a small water feature for balance and energy flow according to Vastu principles.
Guest bathroom for ground floor access
Bedroom with a spacious balcony facing east to harness morning light and positive energy.
Bedroom with a spacious balcony, oriented towards the north for enhanced circulation of air.
Bedroom with a balcony designed to overlook the central courtyard, ensuring privacy and balanced energy.
Master bedroom with adjoining dressing area and enhanced window openings for natural light.
Private bathroom attached to the master bedroom.
Bedroom with a balcony facing west; designed for optimum relaxation and wind circulation.
Bedroom with a small private balcony ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu's energy flow.
Dedicated library area with large windows for natural light; positioned on the eastern side as per Vastu principles.
Bedroom with a private balcony facing north to ensure calm and balanced energy flow.
Bedroom with a balcony offering views of the central courtyard; designed for enhanced privacy.
Bedroom with an expansive balcony providing ample natural light and a pleasant outlook.
Additional bathroom for second floor convenience.
